import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import RoleDashboard from '../components/RoleDashboard'; const Home = () => { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}'); const isLoggedIn = !!localStorage.getItem('token'); return (
{isLoggedIn ? ( ) : ( <> {/* Simple Hero Section */}

Welcome to CivicAid

Your platform for reporting and tracking civic issues in your community

Get Started Sign In
{/* Features Section */}

Report Issues

Easily report civic issues like road problems, water supply, electricity, and more.

Track Progress

Monitor the status of your complaints in real-time and get updates on resolution.

Community Support

Connect with volunteers and NGOs who can help resolve issues in your area.

{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

Register

Create your account as a citizen, volunteer, or NGO

4

Resolve

); }; export default Home;
